description:
Shimada and Rei`s battle continues as Rei begins to drown in his embarassment. Watch as their battle finally comes to a close.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blinding Darkness / Just a Little Water
Mabushii Yami / Honno Sukoshi no Mizu
Une obscurité aveuglante / Juste un peu d`eau
الظلام الساطع / قليلًا من الماء فقط
まぶしい闇 / ほんの少しの水
